tech_news.title: Highguard Dev Assures Fans a New Patch Is on the Way After Website Troubles Spark Fears of Game Shut Down - IGN
tech_news.description: Wildlight has confirmed a new patch is in the works for Highguard after issues related to its official website sparked fears that a full shutdown was imminent.

tech_news.title: Another AirPods Pro 3 model is coming, with one rumored upgrade - 9to5Mac
tech_news.description: AirPods Pro 3 launched just a few months ago, but rumors indicate there’s a second model coming this year with one key upgrade: IR cameras.

tech_news.title: Laser writing in glass for dense, fast and efficient archival data storage - Nature
tech_news.description: An optical archival storage technology based on femtosecond laser direct writing in glass addresses the practical demands of archival storage.

tech_news.title: Critical infra Honeywell CCTVs vulnerable to auth bypass flaw - BleepingComputer
tech_news.description: The U.S. Cybersecurity and Infrastructure Security Agency (CISA) is warning of a critical vulnerability in multiple Honeywell CCTV products that allows unauthorized access to feeds or account hijacking.

tech_news.title: A startup called Germ becomes the first private messenger that launches directly from Bluesky's app - TechCrunch
tech_news.description: Social network Bluesky now offers private messaging by integrating the startup Germ's E2E encrypted messenger natively in its app.

tech_news.title: Football commentator permits EA to use an AI version of his voice for EA Sports FC - GamesIndustry.biz

tech_news.title: The Elder Scrolls 6 Will Use An Upgraded Version Of Starfield And Skyrim's Game Engine - GameSpot
tech_news.description: The Elder Scrolls 6 will be the first Bethesda game to use Creation Engine 3.

tech_news.title: UK's Advertising Standards Authority bans Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 commercial for "trivializing sexual violence" - GamesIndustry.biz

tech_news.title: Todd Howard Shuts Down ‘Starfield 2.0’ Claims and Promises More News ‘Soonish’ - Insider Gaming
tech_news.description: Todd Howard of Bethesda Game Studios has shut down claims that Starfield 2.0 is coming soon, but promises more news soon.

tech_news.title: TFT patch 16.5 - Teamfight Tactics
tech_news.description: We’re past the halfway mark with Lore & Legends and we’re focusing on more specific balance changes.
